attributes.action: Bring back the old GCSE grading system
attributes.additional_details: In conclusion, I feel that this new grading system is too harsh on young students and they should be able to enjoy their youth as well as work hard for their future.
attributes.background: From experience, I’ve seen loads of GCSE students working extra work, not allowing them to have time for their mental/physical health. This new system is making students feel pressured into wanting to pass - and also it means that colleges/universities have to change their requirements.
